text: Did La La Land use stunt doubles? ( Picture : Black Label Media / REX ) Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling used body doubles for La La Land ’ s most complex dance scene, a shocking new report has claimed. Chadwick Boseman fought with Marvel to use African accent in Black Panther The sensational report throws the film ’ s integrity into question, given that it was widely reported how the two stars of the film underwent intense dance training for their roles, of which Emma won an Oscar for. But according to a film insider, the iconic Griffith Observatory scene, which is thought of as the film ’ s most intricate dance sequence in which Emma and Ryan fly through the observatory, apparently looked so good because it was crafted by professional dancers and not Emma and Ryan. Is that Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling dancing … or
